recipe_name: Breaded plaice with herbed rice salad
author: Tony Tobin
method: Coat the plaice fillets in flour, then in the beaten egg and finally in the breadcrumbs. Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan and fry the fillets for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden brown. For the salad, mix the rice, pepper, orange juice and fresh herbs into a large bowl. Spoon the rice onto a serving plate and serve the breaded fillets alongside.
